english_example_sentence: When you were little, you would walk in this beautiful park every day.
russian_example_sentence: Когда ты был маленьким, ты гулял в этом красивом парке каждый день.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen küçükken bu güzel parkta her gün yürürdün.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen küçükken bu güzel parkta her gün ______.
